Who was reinstated to the Tennessee House of Representatives?
Justin Pearson
Why was Justin Pearson expelled from his House seat?
For protesting gun violence
Which party tried to expel Justin Pearson?
Republican
Which board unanimously voted to reinstate Pearson?
Shelby County Board of Commissioners
Which other Democrat was also expelled from the House?
Justin Jones
What was the issue they were protesting?
Gun violence
Who survived expulsion by a single vote?
Rep. Gloria Johnson
Who reinstated Justin Jones to his seat?
Metropolitan Council of Nashville and Davidson County
Are Pearson's and Jones's appointments permanent or interim?
Interim
How many Democratic US senators urged the Department of Justice to investigate the expulsions?
Five
